definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: :Ho 8:8 article, utensil, vessel (NH id.; acc. to Thes fr. [[כלה]] = conficere, like Ger. Zeug fr.zeugen; prop. therefore anything finished, made, produced; acc. to Ba:ZMG 1887, 605 fr. meaning enclose, contain; he finds pl. of [[כְּלִי]] in [[כלאי]] M-I:23 (cf. [[כלאים]]))—´[[כ]] abs. Je 18:4 +; [[הַכֶָּלִי]] 1Sa 17:49, 1Sa 21:6; cstr. [[כְּלִי]] Ho 13:15 +; sf. [[כֶּלְיְְ]] De 23:25; pl. [[כֵּלִים]] Ex 22:6 +; cstr. [[כְּלֵי]] Ge 24:53 +; sf. [[כֵּלַי]] Ge 31:37 + 2 t.; [[כֵּלֶיְ]] Ge 27:3, Ez Eze 12:4; [[כֵּלֵינוּ]] 1Sa 9:7; [[כְּלֵיכֶם]] Ge 43:11 +; [[כְּלֵיהֶם]] Jos 7:11 +;—

in gen., article, object, made of any material, thing, esp. thing of value [[זׇהָב]] ´[[כ]] 1Sa 6:8, 1Sa 6:15 (images of mice, etc.), personal or household property Ge 31:37, Ge 31:37 (E; v:b [[כּׂל כְּלֵי־בֵיתְֶָ]]), Ge 45:20 (E), [[כְּלֵי בֵית־]] [[טוֹבִיׇּהוּ]] Ne 13:18, Jos 7:11 (JE), [[כֶּסֶף אוֹ כֵּלִים]] Ex 22:6 (E) money or articles (property), [[כְּלִי־פָָּז]] Job 28:17 (appar. coll.); things carried, pl. = stuff, load, baggage (impedimenta) 1Sa 17:22, 1Sa 17:22, appar. = baggage-train 1Sa 10:22, 1Sa 25:13, 1Sa 30:24, Is 10:28; (cf. Ge 31:37 supr.); [[כְּלֵי גוֹלָה]] things of exile, i.e. the most necessary articles, such as exiles may take, Je 46:19, Ez Eze 12:3, Eze 12:4 b, Eze 12:7 b, cf. v:Eze 12:4 a, v:Eze 12:7 a; = ornaments or jewels Ge 24:53 (J; [[זׇהָב]] ´[[כֶסֶף וכ]] ´[[כ]], prob. = ornaments), [[זהב]] ´[[כסף וכ]] ´[[כ]] also Ex 3:22, Ex 11:2, Ex 12:35 (all E); Is 61:10, Ex 35:22, Nu 31:50, [[כְּלֵי מַעֲשֶׂה]] v:Nu 31:51 (all P), [[כְּלִי יְקָר]] Pr 20:15 (in fig.), [[תִפְאַרְתֵּךְ]] ´[[כ]] Ez Eze 16:17, Eze 16:39, Eze 23:26 ( all in fig.); [[כְּלֵי נְחשֶׁת]] as merchandise Ez Eze 27:13; [[כֵּלִים]] as cargo of ship Jon 1:5; [[כסף וזהב וּכְלֵי נְחשֶׁת]] [[וּבַרְזֶל]] Jos 6:19, Jos 6:24 (JE; spoil of war); of any household article (on which one sits) Le 15:4, Le 15:6, Le 15:22, Le 15:23, Le 15:26 (all P); of skin Nu 31:20, or wood v:Nu 31:20 (P); [[כְּלִי]] [[חֶמְדָּה]] Na 2:10 precious thing, so Ho 13:15 (fig.), Je 25:34 (sim.), 2Ch 32:27, Da 11:8, [[כלי חֲמֻדוֹת]] 2Ch 20:25 (appar. = ornaments); also [[כְּלִי אֵין־חֵפֶץ בּוֹ]] Je 22:28 (fig. of Coniah, ‖[[עֶחֶב נִבְזֶה נׇפוּץ]]), Ho 8:8 (sim.; cf. Je 48:38 infr.); † specif. of garments (one's ‘ things ’): [[כְּלִי־גֶבֶר]] De 22:5 (‖[[שִׂמְלַת אִשָּׁה]]), so [[כְּלִי־]] [[עוֹר]] Le 13:49 (cf. [[מְלֶאכֶת עוֹר]] v:Le 13:48), v:Le 13:52, v:Le 13:53, v:Le 13:57, v:Le 13:58, v:Le 13:59 (all P).

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: implement of hunting and (esp.) war, = weapon Ge 27:3 (J), 1Sa 20:40, 1Sa 21:9 ([[גַּם חַרְבִּי וְגַם כֵּלַי]]), 1Ki 11:8 = 2Ch 23:7, 1Ki 11:11, Is 54:16, Is 54:17, Je 22:7; prob. also Nu 35:32, [[כְּלִי בַּרְזֶל]] v:Nu 35:16, [[כְּלִי עֵץ־יׇד]] v:Nu 35:18 (all P); [[כְּלֵי]] [[חָמָם]] Ge 49:5 (poem); [[כְּלִי מַשְׁחֵתוֹ]] Ez Eze 9:1, [[מַפָּחוֹ]] ´[[כ]] v:Eze 9:2; fig. of God's weapons [[כְּלֵי־מָוֶת]] Ps 7:14 (‖[[חִצָּיו]]); [[זַעְמוֹ]] ´[[כ]] Is 13:5, Je 50:25; of entire equipment of warrior, armour or armament offensive and defensive 1Sa 17:54 (cf. v:1Sa 17:5 ff.), 1Sa 21:6, 1Sa 21:6 (v. Dr:Sm 139. 293), 1Sa 31:9, 1Sa 31:10 = 1Ch 10:9, 1Ch 10:10; hence ([[כֵּלָיו]])[[נשֵׁׂא כֵלִים ]] armour- or weapon-bearer Ju Jdg 9:54, 1Sa 14:1, 1Sa 14:6, 1Sa 14:7, 1Sa 14:12, 1Sa 14:12, 1Sa 14:13, 1Sa 14:13, 1Sa 14:14, 1Sa 14:17, 1Sa 16:21, 1Sa 31:4, 1Sa 31:4, 1Sa 31:5, 1Sa 31:6 = 1Ch 10:4, 1Ch 10:4, 1Ch 10:5, 2Sa 18:15, 2Sa 23:37 = 1Ch 11:39; fig. [[וְכֵלַי כֵּלָיו רָעִים]] Is 32:7 and a knave, his weapons (i.e. devices, Che ‘ machinations ’) are evil; more precisely [[כְּלֵי מִלְחָמָה]] Ju Jdg 18:11, Jdg 18:16, Jdg 18:17, 1Sa 8:12, 2Sa 1:27, De 1:41, Je 21:4, Je 50:20 (fig.), Ez Eze 32:27, 1Ch 12:34 (van d. H v:33); [[כְּלֵי חְבָא מִלְחָמָה]] 1Ch 12:38 (van d. H v:37); [[כְּלֵי קְרָב]] Ec 9:18; [[בֵּית כֵּלָיו]] 2Ki 20:13 = Is 39:2 is perh. armoury; ´[[כ]] Ez Eze 40:42 is sacrificial knife. †

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: implement of labour, tool [[בַרְזֶל]] ´[[כ]] 1Ki 6:7, or of one's calling, pursuit [[קַח־לְ ְכְּלִי רׂעֶה אֱוִלִי]] Zec 11:15 (otherwise 1Sa 17:40, v.

definitions.title: f.
definitions.body: as gen. term for utensils and furniture of Sol.'s palace 1Ki 10:21 = 2Ch 9:20; esp. (very oft.) of tabern. Ex 25:9, Ex 25:39, Ex 27:3 + (in Hex alw. P), and temple 1Ki 7:45, 1Ki 7:47, 1Ki 7:48, 2Ki 12:14 +; of both palace and temple Je 27:18, Je 27:19, Je 27:21; combinations are [[כְּלֵי הַמִּשְׁכָּן]] Ex 27:19, [[הַמִּזְבֵּחַ]] ´[[כ]] Ex 38:3, [[יהוה]] ´[[כ]] Is 52:11, ´[[בֵית י]] ´[[כ]] Je 27:16, Je 28:3, Je 28:6, Ezr 1:7, ´[[כְּלֵי חֶמְדַּת בֵּית י]] 2Ch 36:10, [[בֵית]] ´[[כ]] [[אֱלֽהִים]] 2Ch 28:24, 2Ch 28:24, 2Ch 36:18, Ne 13:9, Da 1:2, [[הַמִּקְדָּשׁ]] ´[[כ]] Ne 10:40; [[הַשָּׁרֵת]] ´[[כ]] Nu 4:12 utensil of ministry, [[עֲבׂדָתָם]] ´[[כ]] Nu 4:26, 1Ch 9:28, 1Ch 28:14, 1Ch 28:14, ´[[עֲבוֹדַת בֵּית י]] ´[[כ]] 1Ch 28:13, [[מִשְׁמֶרֶת מַשָּׂאָם]] ´[[כ]] Nu 4:32; also [[הַקּׂדֶשׁ]] ´[[כ]] 1Ki 8:4, 1Ch 9:29; of appliances of idol-workship 2Ki 23:4.

vessel, receptacle, of various materials and for various purposes Ge 43:11 (J); 1Sa 9:7, De 23:25; = sack Ge 42:25 (E; [[שַׂק]] in ‖ cl., cf. [[אַמְתַּחַת]] v:Ge 42:27); [[כְּלִי הָרׂעִים]] shepherd's bag or wallet 1Sa 17:40, cf. v:1Sa 17:49; [[חֶרֶשׂ]] ´[[כ]] Je 32:14 is earthen-ware receptacle for deed of sale; for liquids 1Ki 17:10, 2Ki 4:3, 2Ki 4:3, 2Ki 4:4, 2Ki 4:6, 2Ki 4:6, 2Ki 4:6, [[מַשְׁקֶה]] ´[[כ]] 1Ki 10:21 = 2Ch 9:20, [[כְּלֵי שַׁמְנׇהּ]] Nu 4:9, cf. v:Nu 4:10; [[וְלאׁ הוּרַק מִכְּלִי אֶל־כֶָּלִי]] Je 48:11 (fig.), cf. v:Je 48:12 (‖[[נְבָלִים]]); for cooking Le 6:21 ([[חֶרֶשׂ]] ´[[כ]]), v:Le 6:21 ([[נְחשֶׁת]] ´[[כ]]); v. also [[יּוֹחֵר]]([[הַ]]) 2Sa 17:28, Je 19:11 (sim.), Ps 2:9 (sim.), [[לַצּׂרֵף כֶָּלִי]] Pr 25:4; ´[[כ]] [[פָתוּחַ]] Nu 19:15 an open (uncovered) vessel. [[טָהוֹר]] ´[[כ]] Is 66:20 a clean vessel; fig. of Eliakim's relatives [[כְּלֵי הַקָּטָָן מִכְּלֵי הָאַגׇּנוֹת וְעַד כָּל־כְּלֵי הַנְּבָלִים]] Is 22:24 the vessels of smallness (Da:Synt. § 32, R. 5), from the basin-vessels to all the pitcher-vessels. †
